GSD.description:
drm/amdgpu/cs: make commands with 0 chunks illegal behaviour.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 20b947e5a3c74c5084d661c097517a554989d462. For more details please see the references link.
